title: Donate to Save the Children Zimbabwe
body:
Across Zimbabwe, at least 7.7 million people are struggling with food insecurity, including over 3.8 million children.

Before COVID-19, children were already being forced out of school to work and at risk of child marriage. Now, the pandemic has pushed more families to the brink. Save the Children is delivering lifesaving aid, helping reduce the risk of disease outbreaks, and more.

https://www.savethechildren.org/us/where-we-work/zimbabwe
author: 0x8bF129a738d4E5FA34EBa2fe3cDE19611C05BffB
